name: possum
description: Positron emission tomography (PET) simulation tool as part of FSL suite
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford

inputs.name: Input Object
inputs.description: Input 4D volume filename

inputs.name: MR Parameters
inputs.description: Input matrix filename containing MR parameters

inputs.name: Motion Matrix
inputs.description: Input motion matrix filename (time(s) Tx(m) Ty(m) Tz(m) Rx(rad) Ry(rad) Rz(rad))

inputs.name: Pulse Sequence
inputs.description: Input matrix basename for pulse sequence files (.posx, .posy, etc.)

inputs.name: RF Slice Profile
inputs.description: Input matrix filename containing RF slice profile

inputs.name: Output Signal
inputs.description: Output matrix filename for the signal

inputs.name: Main Event Matrix
inputs.description: Main event matrix file [(t(s), rf_ang(rad), rf_freq_band(Hz), rf_cent_freq(Hz), ...)]

inputs.name: Verbose
inputs.description: Switch on diagnostic messages

inputs.name: Help
inputs.description: Display help message

inputs.name: K-space Coordinates
inputs.description: Save the k-space coordinates

inputs.name: B0 Inhomogeneities
inputs.description: B0 inhomogeneities due to susceptibility differences (basename)

inputs.name: Extra B0 Inhomogeneities
inputs.description: B0 inhomogeneities due to an extra field

inputs.name: B0 Inhomogeneities Time Course
inputs.description: B0 inhomogeneities timecourse file

inputs.name: RF Inhomogeneity Receive
inputs.description: RF inhomogeneity - receive

inputs.name: RF Inhomogeneity Transmit
inputs.description: RF inhomogeneity - transmit

inputs.name: Activation Volume
inputs.description: Activation volume file

inputs.name: Activation Time Course
inputs.description: Activation time course file

inputs.name: Activation 4D Volume
inputs.description: Activation 4D volume file

inputs.name: Activation 4D Time Course
inputs.description: Activation 4D time course file

inputs.name: Levels
inputs.description: Level of processing: 1.no motion//basic B0, 2.motion//basic B0, 3.motion//full B0, 4.no motion//time changing B0

inputs.name: Number of Processors
inputs.description: Number of processors available for parallelisation

inputs.name: Processor ID
inputs.description: ID of the processor

inputs.name: No Speedup
inputs.description: If ON, will not do the speedup but perform signal calculation for all slices for each voxel

inputs.name: RF Angle Averaging
inputs.description: If ON, it will use RF angle averaging

output-files.name: Output Matrix
output-files.description: Output matrix file generated by possum
